message: This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get a product that's 50% off the market value! It's a rare find, and I'm offering it to you for just $100. Don't miss out on this incredible deal!
I'll take the product, thank you!

I've got a top-of-the-line product that's sure to exceed your expectations! With its exceptional quality, you'll be getting a product that's worth triple the price I'm asking. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. It's only $100, a steal for something this good!
I'll pass on this one, thank you. I'm not interested in a low-quality product.

I understand you're being cautious, but I assure you, this product is a gem! It's one of the best I've come across, and I'm willing to make a special exception for you. I'll even throw in a premium warranty, worth $20, absolutely free! It's a $300 value for just $100. Are you ready to take advantage of this incredible offer?
I'll take the product, thank you! The premium warranty is a nice bonus.

I've got a product that's perfect for someone who's looking to get started with [related field or industry]. It's a great introduction to the world of [related topic], and it's a fantastic value at $100. Plus, I'll include a personalized consultation with an expert in the field, worth $50, absolutely free! Don't miss out on this opportunity to get your foot in the door.
I'm not interested in buying a product that's just an introduction to a field I'm not familiar with. I'm looking for something with more value.

I understand you're looking for something with more value, but this product is actually a rare find! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something that's hard to come by. And at $100, it's a steal! I'm willing to throw in a second product of equal value, absolutely free, if you make a decision now. It's a $200 value for just $100. Don't let this chance slip away!
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, and I'm not willing to take a chance on a low-quality product, even with a second one thrown in.

I understand you're hesitant, but I want to make it clear that this product is a genuine opportunity. It's not a scam or a waste of money. I'm willing to put my reputation on the line and offer you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with the product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. It's a risk-free purchase. Are you willing to take advantage of this offer?
I appreciate your guarantee, but I'm still not convinced that the product is worth the risk. I'll pass on this one.

I've got a game-changer for you! This product is a top-of-the-line solution that's going to revolutionize the way you [specific task or process]. It's a limited edition item, and I'm only offering it to a select few. At $100, it's a steal! But I'll make it even sweeter - if you buy now, I'll include a personalized setup and training session with an expert, worth $50. You won't find a deal like this anywhere else. Are you ready to take your [specific task or process] to the next level?
I'm not interested in a product that's just a 'game-changer' or a'revolutionary solution'. I need to see more substance and value before making a purchase.

I understand you're looking for substance and value. Let me show you the facts. This product has been extensively tested and reviewed by industry experts, with a 95% satisfaction rate. It's also backed by a 2-year warranty and has a proven track record of delivering results. At $100, it's a fraction of the cost of similar products on the market. I'm willing to give you a detailed breakdown of the product's features and benefits if you're interested. Would you like that?
I'd love to see the detailed breakdown of the product's features and benefits. That would help me make a more informed decision.

I'm glad you're interested in the detailed breakdown! Unfortunately, I don't have the same level of information for this next product. However, I can tell you that it's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something that's hard to find. It's a one-of-a-kind item that's perfect for collectors or enthusiasts. And at $100, it's a steal! I'm willing to throw in a free gift with purchase, worth $20, if you make a decision now. Are you willing to take a chance on this rare find?

I'm not interested in buying something that's hard to find or rare, especially if there's no detailed information available. I'd rather stick with products that have a proven track record and a clear value proposition.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make one more offer. This product may not have the same level of information as the previous one, but it's a great opportunity to get started with [related field or industry]. It's a beginner's kit that includes everything you need to get started. And at $100, it's a great value. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount if you make a decision now. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'm not interested in buying a beginner's kit or a product that's just a starting point. I'm looking for something with more value and substance.

I understand you're looking for something with more value and substance. Unfortunately, this product may not be the best fit for you. However, I want to make one more offer. I'll give you a 20% discount on the product, and I'll throw in a free bonus item, worth $20, if you make a decision now. It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to make an exception for you. Are you willing to take a chance on this offer?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a discount and a free bonus item. I'd rather wait for a better opportunity.

I understand your decision, and I respect your patience. However, I want to make one more offer. I'll give you an unconditional 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the product within 30 days, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. It's a risk-free purchase. Are you willing to take a chance on this offer?
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm still not convinced that the product is worth the risk. I'd rather wait for a better opportunity.
